scripts.build: copyfiles -u 5 node_modules/@theatrixx/theatrixx-design/dist/fonts/**/* dist/fonts && copyfiles -u 4 node_modules/@theatrixx/theatrixx-design/dist/index.js dist/ && sass index.scss dist/index.css --style=compressed
scripts.watch: copyfiles -u 5 node_modules/@theatrixx/theatrixx-design/dist/fonts/**/* dist/fonts && copyfiles -u 4 node_modules/@theatrixx/theatrixx-design/dist/index.js dist/ && sass index.scss dist/index.css --style=compressed --watch
